thread.title: CBB's Kim Woodburn feared Nicola McClean wanted to KILL her: "She would've stabbed me!"
thread.title_full: CBB's Kim Woodburn feared Nicola McClean wanted to KILL her: "She would've stabbed me!"

author: mirror
title: CBB's Kim Woodburn feared Nicola McClean wanted to KILL her: "She would've stabbed me!"
text:
Kim Woodburn and Nicola Mclean Share Get celebs   
There was no love lost between them in the Celebrity Big Brother house, but now Kim Woodburn says she feared being seriously injured by ex-housemate Nicola McClean. 
In a sensational interview with a Sunday newspaper, the 74 year-old clean queen claims their feuding had the potential to become physical and, possibly, life-threatening. 
Speaking to the Daily Star , she said: “Nicola could start a row in an empty house. She is an evil little beggar. She was smiling while she said the vilest things about me. 
“She made it clear I either toed the line or she’d put me through hell. I never felt unsafe because they all wanted to win – that was my saving grace. Kim Woodburn's latest claim is that Nicola wanted to physically attack her The two women were constantly arguing in the CBB house (Photo: TV Grab) Read More Kim Woodburn lashes out at 'boring fag ash' Celebrity Big Brother winner Coleen Nolan 
“Nicola knew if there was any violence she was out and so did all the others. But Nicola would have stabbed me if she could have. You know what I’m saying. I hope the day will never come when I am in the same room as her again.” 
The Mirror have contacted a representative for Nicola, but are yet to receive a response. 
The latest comments come just days after the two women were liberated from the surveillance house, where they became embroiled in frequent clashes on-camera. Kim was evicted in third place during the Celeb Big Brother final, this week (Photo: PA) Read More Nicola McLean reignites Danielle Lloyd row: 'I DID go to her wedding, she talks a load of f**king tripe!' 
On Thursday, Nicola fired a tirade of abuse at Kim after she took a swipe at Nicola’s former Page 3 girl days. 
“I’m just done!” ranted Nicola. “She’s a nasty f**king b***h. She’s so condescending and arrogant and aggressive. The names she calls me, I don’t understand how she is allowed to stand there and be that f**king aggressive. 
"I never want to see her again. Don’t f**king talk to me. Don’t look at me. I f**king dislike you and your f***king hairpiece.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
